bio: Hi, my name is Yunzhe Zhu, and feel free to call me Richard. I am a new Summer Intern who just graduated from Pratt in May 2024. During the long journey of studying, 3 years study in Master degree of Architecture from Pratt and 4 years study in Interior Design from Parsons, I found myself really enjoy in any kind of creative and interesting works! Also, I am interested in digital modeling, geometric and computational design. Beyond the field in Architecture, I have minored in Photography in Parsons, A co-founder of a Digital Fashion studio based in New York and have a bartender license. I am very glad that I can have this great opportunity to meet ennead's amazing design team this summer!

proj_1.name: Science Park and Research Campus (SPARC) Kips Bay
